```{python}
def merge_sort (array):

    if len(array) == 1:
        return array

    elif len(array) > 1:
        midpoint = len(array) // 2
        s1 = merge_sort(array[:midpoint])
        s2 = merge_sort(array[midpoint:])
        
        for i in s1:
            index = 0
            for j in s2:
                if j >= i:
                    s2.insert(index, i)
                    break
                if index + 1 == len(s2):
                    s2.append(i)
                    break
                index += 1
        print(s2)   
        return s2
```

```{python}
arr = [2,3,1,66,0,9]
```

```{python}
merge_sort(arr)
```
